channel.title: Verify the downloads
channel.description:
Hi The process of verification is very important and I want to be sure I'm correct If I download whonix and forget asc file, after some hours I download it, do the verification is reliable? Do I download another time whonix?
Best

item.title: Verify the downloads
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Right. And if this wasn’t reliable, then gnupg would be seriously broken.

Read full topic

item.title: Verify the downloads
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Yes, you can verify the images even if you download the asc files considerably later. We don’t change the version that often.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
